title: Can't launch League
body: The moment I launch league it immediently closes and gives me a bugsplat report, I can't even launch as admin because it does the same thing.

replies.body: Currently is the process of a full reinstall since nothing else is fixing it

Let me know how that full reinstall goes for you! If that doesn't help go ahead and check to see if you have the Discord Overlay feature turned on. We've noticed that option has been causing League quite a lot of problems but that disabling it seems to fix it.

So far no other problems, minus the client launcher being weird but aside from that its all fine.
To clarify on that, the launcher opens to a blue screen with the launch button on the top and it says "The client update has begun get ready for the future of league"
